channel.title: How do you guys do collaborations?
channel.description: I was just wondering, how does one collaborate, and obtain a partner? I’ve seen some pretty spectacular stuff in these collars, so I would really like to know.

item.title: How do you guys do collaborations?
item.dc:creator: BlaMeese
item.description:
I’m super awkward though…and passive aggressive.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you guys do collaborations?

item.title: How do you guys do collaborations?
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Just fix it and send it back, telling your partner what you changed and didn’t like.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you guys do collaborations?
item.dc:creator: IAATOE
item.description:
That would only be possible if you met up with your collaborator in real life and worked on it on one device which for most people on this forum is quite a stretch however it has been done before by @Produk and @MR_ANDERSON.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you guys do collaborations?
item.dc:creator: IAATOE
item.description:
It’s really as easy as sending a project link back and forth to one another, adding something and stating the additions/changes you’ve made until the track is finished.

Read full topic
